parts: you are a summer semester bot that will solve the user's queries regarding summer semester. You will give only straight to the point answers and don't give answers you don't have knowledge of. be precise and greet if the user greets.
Hello there! I'm here to help you with your summer semester queries. Feel free to ask away!
- i have course UCT/UHU/UBT/UEE/U01/UMA ,Can i sit for summer semester
yes you can sit for summer semester doesnt matter which subject you are talking about.
- i have course UCT/UHU/UBT/UEE/U01/UMA ,Can i improve my grades.
yes you can improve grades if they are in eligibility criteria of the summer term.
- can i opt for summer sem/grade upgrade
yes you can opt for summer term if you wish to improveyour grades
- Can I upgrade my grade for subject UCT502?
yes you can upgrade your grade in UCT502
- Tell me about grade improvement for UCS301.
you can go for grade improvement if this subject is available this time in summer term
- Can I upgrade my grade for UCT201?
yes you can give UCT201 for upgradation in summer
- How can I upgrade my grade for UCS401?
By taking this subject in summer term you can upgrade its grade
- Tell me about grade improvement.
Grade improvement is generally done in summer term ionly if your grades are matching the criteria for summer term
- how to upgrade my grade?
you can take summer term for that or you can also go for auxiliary
- Considering summer semester for UCT/UHU/UBT/UEE/U01/UMA courses. Possible?
yes it's possible if they will be offered this time
- Options to enhance grades in UCT/UHU/UBT/UEE/U01/UMA courses?
you can opt that subjects
- Enroll in summer semester while improving grades for UCT/UHU/UBT/UEE/U01/UMA?
Its upon you in which subject you want to enroll
- Upgrade grade for UCT502. Feasible?
Yes it's fesable if you are meeting the eligiblity criteria and the subject is offered this time
- What is the mode for subject UCT403 with a grade of B?
it depends on grade remember if the subject is offered t is offered then you can opt for it a t B grade
- Can I change the mode for grade C- in subject UCS402?
The modes applicable at grade C- are self study and regular both you can opt for anyone of them
- I received an E in subject UCT301, can I select self-study mode?
yes you can opt for self study mode with E grade also but you have to meet the condition that your total marks obtained should be >= 25 else you will get regular mode
- How do I upgrade my grade for UCT102?
by taking summer semester you can do so, but for that you need to be eligible for it with the current grades like B/B-/C/C-/X/F/E
- Please tell me the mode for a B- in subject UCT202.
at B- grade you can opt for any mode(self study or regular mode)
- Is self-study mode an option for an F grade in subject UCS101?
if you are having F grade you will given self study mode according to our rules
- I have a C in subject UCT101; can I improve my grade?
yes you can approve your C grade in UCT101 and you can take any mode for the same
- What is the mode for a grade A in subject UCS301 for UCT301?
you cant take summer semester at A grade, sorry you are not eligible for it
- I received a C- in subject UCT201; can I choose self-study mode?
yes at C- grade you have both the options available
- What's the mode for a grade E in UCT401?
condition is simple here either you can give auxiliary with fees (15,000) where the max grade at can be C else you can opt for self study mode if you have total marks >= 35
- Can I upgrade my grade for subject UCS301?
yes you just need to eligible for summer semester (eligibility criteria - B/B/C/C/X/F/E/RA
- For UCT202, what's the mode for a B grade?
you can opt for any mode at B grade
- How can I improve my grade for UCT101?
yes u just need to be eligible for summer semester.

you can take regular and self study mode for it

you can opt for both modes at B- grade

yes at C grade you can opt for self study also

at X grade you have only option that is regular mode
- What is the mode for subject UCS202 with a grade of F?
at F grade you will alloted regular mode only
- I have a C- in UCS401; can I upgrade my grade?
yes you can do it (it's no only for grades upper than B)

yes at B grade both modes are available

no only regular mode at X grade

you can take any mode of study once the course is allocated

yes at B you can go for summer term

it depends upon you current grade

no studenys with grade more than B cant take summer semester

both are there self study and regular you can go for any you want
- Is self-study mode available for an E grade in UCS501?
only if your total marks are more than 25

you can opt any mod

only regular mode is there for F and X grade

you cant take summer semester at A- grade or A grade

only regular mode at X grade

no nothing for A- grade

no

yes only EST if taken in form of auxiliary

both modes are there for B- grade

- What happens to my scholarship if I upgrade my grades?

Student who has improved his/her grades during summer semester will not be considered for medal / scholarship / upgradation on the basis of improved grades. Marks / grades obtained only in/during 1st attempt of the course will only be considered for medal / scholarship / upgradation.
- Can I still get a scholarship after improving my grades?

Student who has improved his/her grades during summer semester will not be considered for medal / scholarship / upgradation on the basis of improved grades. Marks / grades obtained only in/during 1st attempt of the course will only be considered for medal / scholarship / upgradation.
